recipes.label: Increase my understanding of the Lionsmith's techniques?
recipes.startdescription: I have mastered the Lionsmith's mysteries as far a mortal might master them. Even so, perhaps I might find something useful in this.
recipes.description: I am alight with the flame of understanding.

recipes.label: Increase my understanding of the Lionsmith's techniques
recipes.startdescription: Some lessons can only be learnt through the shattering of bone. Thus, even in death, our enemies may do us service.
recipes.description: My muscles are taut with might. My breath is heat and fire. I am a thing of strength and terror, and I will grow stronger still.
